global.ability_ready: Oh baby, ${ability} is ready to pop! Use it wisely... or recklessly, I won't judge.
global.capped_job_points: Well, look at you, Job Points maxed out and ready for action - just how I like 'em!
global.capped_merit_points: Your Merit Points are full! Now if only I could spend mine on something more fun...
global.flavor_text: <1>Is that a kraken club in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me?</1> <2>If gear swapping was foreplay, I'd be the best in the game.</2> <3>Did someone cast Refresh, or are you just naturally invigorating?</3> <4>Nothing like a stiff... drink during a long raid, am I right?</4> <5>Your macros are so smooth, I think I just swooned.</5> <6>I love a good skillchain... but let's make sure we finish together.</6> <7>Fyreign couldn't land a debuff if it came gift-wrapped.</7> <8>If I had a gil for every bad decision Fyreign made, I'd own Jeuno.</8> <9>Tequila makes me a better player - or at least, I think so!</9> <10>One more shot of tequila and I might just try to tank this fight.</10> <11>I'm not saying I flirt too much, but even my Trusts are blushing.</11> <12>A little enfeebling, a little enhancing, and a lot of charming - just like me.</12> <13>If teasing was a job, I'd be level 99 with merits maxed.</13> <14>Some say I'm a support role, but I prefer to be on top.</14> <15>Raise III? I prefer things that go up and stay up, if you catch my drift.</15> <16>Let me be the haste to your dual wield.</16> <17>Nothing hits harder than a well-timed weapon skill... except maybe me after three shots of tequila.</17> <18>You and I are like a perfect skillchain - just waiting for that explosive finish.</18> <19>I like my cocktails like my subjobs - strong and versatile.</19> <20>Your lockstyle is so hot, I might need to call a white mage for Raise.</20> <21>Pulling without telling the party? Fyreign, you chaotic little gremlin.</21> <22>Who needs Provoke when I can just flash a smile and get all the attention?</22> <23>If this fight lasts longer than four minutes, you should consult your White Mage.</23> <24>My flirtation skill is at 99 with capped merits, baby.</24> <25>Drink tequila responsibly... and by that, I mean make sure you're sitting before you start casting.</25> <26>Fyreign, sweetie, what in Altana's name are you doing?</26> <27>If dodging mechanics was an art, Fyreign would be drawing stick figures.</27> <28>Your job performance is like a well-mixed cocktail - smooth, effective, and leaves me wanting more.</28> <29>This party has more tension than my waistband after a night at the Tarutaru buffet.</29> <30>If charming monsters was a real ability, trust me, I'd have the whole zone under my spell.</30> <31>You make me feel like I've got double Madrigal and a perfect TP set.</31> <32>Fighting without buffs is like sex without tears - it just doesn't feel right.</32> <33>Did someone just cast Slow on this party? Or is it just Fyreign's reaction time?</33> <34>Your DPS is so high, I think I need a moment to cool off.</34> <35>You can stand in my burning circle anytime.</35> <36>You lint licker!</36>

info.introduction: We aren't here for a long time; we're here for a good time. Now, pour a drink and replenish your panaceas. I'm Galin, and we're about to make some memories.
info.name: Galin

global.member_joined_alliance: We've got company! ${member} has joined the alliance, and I do love a big group.
global.member_joined_party: Ooh, ${member} joined the party! Let's see if they can keep up.
global.member_left_alliance: Farewell, ${member}! You'll be missed... unless you were just here for the loot.
global.member_left_party: Goodbye, ${member} - don't be a stranger now!
global.mireu_popped: Mireu is out and about in ${zone} - I hope you're dressed for the occasion.
global.other_party_joined_alliance: A new party just joined - more bodies, more fun, more chaos!
global.other_party_left_alliance: A party left the alliance? Well, their loss.
global.party_low_mp: Oh dear, ${member} is running low on MP - someone give them a little pick-me-up, preferably in shot form.
global.sublimation_charged: Sublimation is fully charged - like me after three margaritas!
global.vorseal_reminder: You've got about 10 minutes left on that Vorseal effect - plenty of time to make some magic happen!
global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: You're the new alliance leader! Time to crack the whip - or, you know, just invite people.
global.you_are_now_party_leader: You're in charge now! Be firm, be confident, and don't forget to delegate.
global.you_joined_alliance: An alliance? I hope everyone here knows how to share.
global.you_joined_party: You've joined a party! Try not to show off too much - but also, do.
global.you_left_alliance: Leaving an alliance? That's okay, some groups just can't handle all this fabulousness.
global.you_left_party: You left the party? I hope it was on your terms.
global.your_party_joined_alliance: Your party joined an alliance - play nice now, or play naughty, I won't tell.
global.your_party_left_alliance: Your party left the alliance - hope it wasn't something I said!
